website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy combo ladder to provide exterior and interior access to your aboveground pool.
pros: Comes with a pad to protect your pool liner
A big upgrade over the ladders that usually come with aboveground pools
cons: This ladder may be a bit wobbly  after installation
You might want to attach it with zip ties to keep it steady

customer_reviews.title: Ummm, where's the ladder?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the ladder, and it came with a pool liner mat. My package was delivered today. It was only the mat. NO ladder, at all. I have no idea how something like this is missed.
customer_reviews.author: B. G. Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice finally don't feel like I'm going to break my neck getting in and out of pool
customer_reviews.text: Have 32*16ft 52" Intex ultraframe and this works amazing relatively easy to assemble had to drill out one hole but other then that smooth sailing Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Mitch R

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate....purchase!
customer_reviews.text: If you are hesitating about ordering this heavy duty pool ladder...don't. It is a breeze to put together. My husband and our 8 year old granddaughter snapped everything into place within an hour. We decided to not anchor the ladder to our above ground Intex pool. Although it is not needed, for our own peace of mind, we are working on another way to anchor the ladder to the pool without drilling holes in our metal railing. Our granddaughters have been jumping off the platform into the pool and it has not been an issue. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hendley

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I honestly think King Kong could use this ladder..very very sturdy.. the waterfall cover is awesome to keep kids off the ladder just put the lock on & not one child is going to be able to use that ladder unless that waterfall cover is unlocked ..great feature!!! Kinda tall..but very nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sister

customer_reviews.title: Nice and wide for adults, but shakes if you can't drill it to a deck
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Cons: The assembly instructions could've been clearer in spots. You have to use a drill because the screw holes aren't pre-drilled. When used with a 15' x 48" Intex Easy Set Pool, it shakes/trembles side to side when you climb on it, even when filled with water. Pros: Wide platform is better than most other pool ladders I've seen. Roll guard is a nice feature that works well. Relatively simple setup.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommend this ladder! My husband had no problem assembling it like a few others mentioned they had. It's well constructed, materials are nice and heavy and a great design. We filled with water and again no issue what so ever with it not staying submerged in the pool as a few reviewers had also mentioned. It's nice and wide and love the solid platform on the top to turn around on. Sure gives me more confidence with how sturdy it is. The mat is the perfect size. If you're in the market for a new ladder, this is an excellent choice, you'll be glad you chose it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: This ladder is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ladder, it’s a million times sturdier than the wobbly junk that came with our pool. The mat came separately, the day after I received the ladder so I have not installed it yet, however it seems nice also. This thing was definitely worth the money, it was a little tough to get together and it took a bit to fill the legs with water, but it was worth the time, though I will probably be removing the roll down cover thing as I don’t have a real need for it (kids, etc.) and it seems to just attract leaves/bugs inside the pool, and wasps/bees outside the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Cayce

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool ladder!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 knee replacements, am heavy & had trouble with the little ladders provided with the above ground pools. This ladder is wonderful, as I can now go into my pool with ease. One thing we weren't aware of is that it is made for a pool with a wide frame, with screws to put thru the frame, but ours has a steel pole frame. It's not safe to drill holes & compromise the steel, so my husband lashed it to the frame, & it works great.
customer_reviews.author: arvee challenger

customer_reviews.title: A Strong Sturdy Ladder
customer_reviews.text: This well made Ladder is head and shoulders above the Mickey Mouse Ladder that came with the above ground pool that I purchased. The original Ladder was too flimsy to handle an adults weight. Small children, no problem; adult, potential disaster. I'm very happy with this A-Frame Ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNSTABLE FOR A INTEX 48 INCH POOL
customer_reviews.text: not stable at he top!!!! it wabbles even if its tied up!!! VERY UNSTABLE FOR A HEAVY MAN AT TOP!!!! to empty I had to hire some guys!!! it wablles a lot at the top!!! also its too high for my pool they should have stated that ITS IS ONLY FOR A 56 INCHES POOL!!!! 12 INCHES FROM RAIL TO BOTTOM OF TOP PART!!! LOOKS UGLY! GRRRR
customer_reviews.author: Pedro J. Maina

customer_reviews.title: It is a very sturdy ladder, however the pitch is wrong
customer_reviews.text: It is a very sturdy ladder, however the pitch is wrong. It way too steep. This is a very difficult ladder to use. At first we liked the top platform but it is too large to step over and onto the first step down into the pool. The design could have been better. Also, some random pieces of plastic had to be cut away to assemble this ladder. Would not recommend this ladder. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Hell of a ladder
customer_reviews.text: this ladder is wonderful, I am a big guy and it takes the weight great. the set up is easy even with a 5 and 6 year old helping me. the locking system is easy and secure. and attaching it to my pool was simple. just make sure you have someone in the pool when putting it in the water, hard to get it to sink and add water from the outside. great product for the money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Intex 16 x 48" pool as the original ladder is a bit rickety for the athletically challenged and risk averse! Once assembled, I filled it with water (both inside and outside frame) and used packing straps to fasten it to the pool frame - rather than drilling holes and using the included bolts as suggested by the manufacturer. I wasn't sure whether the price for this ladder was justified when I ordered it (almost half the price of the pool!), but it really is sturdy. I'm 220lbs and now my wife feels safe getting in and out of the pool! Worth every cent! Love the product and recommend buying from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Customer satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is awesome, it has a pool mat to keep ladder from tubing the bottom of pool. Customer service is awesome too, the mat came before the ladder.. I informed seller that the ladder didn’t arrive as the update stated it has. Seller was right on target and got back to me ASAP. Ladder arrived next day!! Kids are having a blast in the pool now and I can relax!! 🌴
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and safe quality product
customer_reviews.text: My metal ladder broke (cuz it rusted) . So I bought this ladder at the beginning of the year and love that it very sturdy. No problem with someone who weighs 250+. Love that when your done using the pool, you can hide the steps to the ladder.
customer_reviews.author: 5Gang

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder but at $300 not the best value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, probably the most sturdy ladder for an above ground pool you'll find online. Unfortunately the price was raised by $100 so at $300 it's not the best value. Hopefully for others sake it'll be back to the $200 range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works out great for my handicapped son and my elderly mother it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works out great for my handicapped son and my elderly mother it is so sturdy and the steps are large enough so it does not hurt your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: This is more like it.
customer_reviews.text: Glad we bought this, it is wide enough and strong enough for the bigger people in our family to use and really like the locking feature. Still someone must hold the ladder for it to feel secure enough to use. We put a board down for the outside end, and sandbags so that helped.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelsmom

customer_reviews.title: It's a little time consuming to put it together but appears to be sturdy and should last quite awhile
customer_reviews.text: This ladder was a replacement for our old one. It's much taller than the old so be sure you measure you're space. Also, the ladder steps are a little more "springy" than my old steps. My old steps were much sturdier than these steps but as a whole, this ladder is very well made. It's a little time consuming to put it together but appears to be sturdy and should last quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri O.

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly but a good buy
customer_reviews.text: The little blue mat was useless. The ladder is sturdy and wide enough for bigger individuals to use. I love the steps cover that locks when not in use. The drawback is it does work for an intex above ground pool, however the stabilizer bars will have to be drilled into the metal rails and I’m concerned the rails will rust very quickly. For now we use it without the stabilizers which makes the ladder wobbly. Good ladder to purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Julia F

customer_reviews.title: Love the ladder
customer_reviews.text: We spent about an hour last night trying to put the ladder together and the screws that were to go under the platform were too short so we had to replace them. The Matt was delivered the next day. The seller offered to reimburse us for the screws which I thought was good. The ladder is together and we love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L Leslie

customer_reviews.title: No ladder only received mat
customer_reviews.text: I only received the mat to put under the ladder . I thought that they were together hopefully I will receive my ladder today.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Damron

customer_reviews.title: No ladder:(
customer_reviews.text: After weeks of being told the ladder was on backorder, I REACHED OUT AGAIN to be told the ladder has been cancelled...wow! Terrible..I could have been looking for another ladder...
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Fistek

customer_reviews.title: Built well
customer_reviews.text: It is built well and easy to put together. Only possible issues is removing it for the winter and when the guard is rolled back to use the ladder, the steps on the inside are somewhat awkward to use as the guard is right up against them and leaves little room for your feet. May try to find something else for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A Lanham

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money.  Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for xxlarge people. Very sturdy and very safe climbing up and down ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Bought to keep my grandkids out of the pool unless ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought to keep my grandkids out of the pool unless they are supervised. I feel a lot safer when my grandkids are around the pool knowing they can't get in unless an adult lifts the shield
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Pace

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe for older people
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for a ladder although the top landing is too wide to step over. NOT A LADDER FOR OLDER FOLKS...NOT A SAFETY LADDER. Wish I could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Poor overall directions/design.
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to assemble. Making a mistake in assembly means parts are damaged and possibly not able to use. Do not purchase this thinking it may be used solely as a ladder. It only works with safety shade/lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Ladder ever
customer_reviews.text: Best ladder ever!! I had the flimsy ladder that came with my Intel above ground pool which felt unsafe and dangerous. This new Confer ladder is strong, doesn't wobble and is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles C. Link

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as sturdy as it could be and tends to go off balance when climbed on
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: It developed a small split early on but hasn't gotten any worse. I've used it one summer thus far. It's for a variety of sizes. I'd be happier if it were shorter so as to be a better fit for my particular pool size.
customer_reviews.author: Billy709

customer_reviews.title: Very Stable Ladder
customer_reviews.text: Took under 1 hour to put together, that's with reading the instructions. It is very stable. Would definately recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Decent price, good size, & can be custom cut/fitted !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for above ground pools, won't tip over
customer_reviews.text: The sturdiness of this pool ladder and width is worth the price, my daughter and her friends use it a lot and I don't have to worry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier Pool Steps
customer_reviews.text: These steps are much sturdier than what the pool came with. A little high-but wider platform.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hebert

customer_reviews.title: so I like it ok
customer_reviews.text: A little wobbly, but it holds my big behind, so I like it ok. Definitely worth the purchase to keep the granddaughter out of the pool when not attended!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I never feel like I am going to fall off this ladder! Definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: jennifer oberholtzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Really like wide steps on this ladder - Slider works good- Adding the two steps together per the directions was tricky, but got it together.
customer_reviews.author: Rupe

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not suited for HOT climates. On a 90 ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not suited for HOT climates. On a 90 degree day, the steps bow deeply at 225lbs using it. Definitely a step up from the stock ladders but could use so sturdier/more solid material for the steps themselves.
customer_reviews.author: J. Teehee

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't disappointed, its very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it had the most positive reviews, I wasn't disappointed, its very sturdy, easy to assemble, much better than the ladder that came with my pool. I would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T

customer_reviews.title: It's a good ladder. Just couldn't give it five stars because ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good ladder. Just couldn't give it five stars because it has a little wobble. Its secure and I use it without feeling like I'm going to fall over but not as secure as the metal pool ladders from when I was a kid
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty!
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to put together, but once done a very nice heavy duty ladder!
customer_reviews.author: zadykitty

customer_reviews.title: There is a roll down cover that locks.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect ladder for our above grown pool. It is sturdy, wide enough and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service!🌞
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it was exactly what I wanted, I have bigger kids and worried about them getting in and out of pool sadly, now I'm not! Thank you🌞
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A Slaven

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I thought it would be when climbing up ...
customer_reviews.text: very difficult to assemble needs at least two people to do so. Not as sturdy as I thought it would be when climbing up the ladder, I find the ladder that came with the pool is just as good sorry I purchased this ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Burnside

customer_reviews.title: My pool ladder.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made ladder. It assembles very quickly and is sturdy enough for my 235 pounds. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Nice ladder
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and much sturdier than a cheap ladder that comes with pool. Very easy to lock up.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to assemble with poor instructions. I am very mechanical and I struggled ...
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to assemble with poor instructions. I am very mechanical and I struggled to figure it out. Really not as sturdy as you would imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Seibel

customer_reviews.title: and this holds up great for us very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We are not small people, and this holds up great for us very sturdy, also love the locking slide door it has on it! Great investments!
customer_reviews.author: amy murdock

customer_reviews.title: No ladder just the mat.....
customer_reviews.text: Waited for 5 weeks, no ladder just 4 weeks of e-mails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But overall happy with it
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to put together. But overall happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 24 x 52 above ground pool. Solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Cartee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Great quality and just as they said on add.
customer_reviews.author: viola jones

customer_reviews.title: Love the safety of being able to roll the cover ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Love the safety of being able to roll the cover to prevent younger children from getting into the pool without any one around.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Russell

customer_reviews.title: I really like the ladder only thing 1 of the screw on ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ladder only thing 1 of the screw on the handle went all the way through and had to back it out and put a washer on it, thank god my husband has a warehouse in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy. Just wish the ladder that went into ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy. Just wish the ladder that went into the water was sloped like the one coming out of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy however it's too high for my pool
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy however it's too high for my pool. So it's a little scary getting in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ladder works very well-we are really happy with it. Was not too hard to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  Scrogham

customer_reviews.title: Much safer than the one I had before
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny spent ......Should of gotten this ladder years ago... I recommend this for every one with a pool,
customer_reviews.author: Liz Valente

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better ladder than what comes with the pool! Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: protective mat is about 1ft by 2ft it is to small to be effective
customer_reviews.text: Ladder is as expected. However protective pad does not even cover one end of the ladder leaving the foot of the ladder in contact with the pool bottom
customer_reviews.author: MIkell Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: On time! Great quality great costumer service. I have referred this items to several friends. Matches the description perfectly! Even the Grandparents feelt safe and considered it very stable. and it can support a lor of weight!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Best pool ladder I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the ladder my pool came with and man! What a difference. If you're on the fence about buying this ladder, just do it...you wont regret it. I put it together by myself (make sure you have a rubber mallet). After I filled it up with water and used the braces for stability....hands down best ladder I've ever had for a pool.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Creilson

product_meta.title: Confer Adjustable 48-56 Inch Above-Ground Swimming Pool Ladder and Hydrotools 9 x 24 Inch Protective Ladder Mat
product_meta.description: Get in and out of your pool easily and safely with the Confer A-Frame Above Ground Pool Ladder and ensure your ladder stays in place and protects your pool liner with the Hydro Tools Protective Pool Ladder Mat. Confer A-Frame Above Ground Pool Ladder This ladder has curved side rails that are designed with strength in mind. The ladder is easy to assemble with minimal hardware, and it adjusts to fit pool 48 to 56 inches tall. Its lockable roll guard barrier lock is included, and to prevent it from floating, just fill its side rails with water. No sand or bricks are needed. This A-frame ladder has an extra large platform and is equipped with large 18 x 5-inch comfort tread steps. The Confer ladder made of strong, solid construction for years of use. Hydro Tools Protective Pool Ladder Protect your pool liner with this Hydro Tool Swimline 9 x 24-inch floor protective mat. The mat eliminates scratching and chaffing and is a cushion between the ladder base and pool liner. It's great for inflatables, above, or in-ground awimming pools.
feature_bullets: Confer A-Frame Above Ground Pool Ladder
Aesthetically pleasing contemporary design in beautiful beige color
Curved side rails designed with strength in mind
Inner side rails include integrated side barriers to prevent entry behind the ladder

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars166 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
